conversations.body_text: Hi Kevin Dewson,     Here is your logistics tracking link: https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3281732347835

Hi,

You mean this that is incorrect or has no information?



[image0.png]
Sent from my iPhone
Hello, the package was shipped today and there are no tracking updates yet. Updates should be available later.

Cool.

I see your express shipping just got updated to 3-7 days. Not exactly express.


Sent from my iPhone
Hi Kevin Dewson,    We have sent your package via express delivery, which is expected to arrive around the 2nd.

Thanks for confirming, they were on express due to a deadline.

Looking forward to using them!

Sent from my iPhone
